title: What is the most innovative tech company in the past decade? - Quora

response.answer_text: What is the most innovative tech company in the past decade? It depends a lot on what you mean by innovation and possibly also what you consider to be tech, since everything now has a strong dependence on technologies (plural). Here are my nominations, as of April 2018 : Microsoft - Considering, for example, HoloLens as an engineering marvel Google - for their Google Home smart speaker system If you focus the definition a bit more narrowly on select sectors, then there are some more: Impossible Foods - Making vegetarian meat-like food Medtronic - For being the leader in the artificial pancreas arena Boston Dynamics - Versatile robots that are ambulatory across domains and conditions. Thanks for the a2a

This is a great quote by Jeff Bezos to think about before answering this question: "It's not enough to only listen to your customers. You also need to invent on their behalf."By this standard, Apple is at the top of my list. They created products I didn't think I needed but later learned that I could not live without. By the standard of shareholder value, if you add up the numbers, I think AAPL has created more value than Google, Facebook, Twitter and Microsoft COMBINED during the 2000-2010 decade.
